trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Pawkwena has a produce-picking problem.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Shepimenye.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_TODO_01<tab>Select a vegetable.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the veggie sack to Pawkwena.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_PAWKWENA_000_000<tab>I'm not sure what you're doing here, but I certainly won't look a gift rroneek in the mouth. Could you go and fetch me a vegetable?
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_PAWKWENA_000_001<tab>Er...I should probably explain. I'm trying to plan out my dinner tonight, but for the life of me, I just can't decide what to make!
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_PAWKWENA_000_002<tab>It won't be much trouble, I promise you. Go to Yyupye's Halo and speak to Shepimenye─he's bound to have a few seasonal offerings.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_PAWKWENA_000_003<tab>Go to Yyupye's Halo and speak to Shepimenye. He'll have something fresh to offer, I'm sure of it.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_SHEPIMENYE_000_004<tab>Aren't you the guest who was touring the farm with Queen Sphene? Is there something I can assist you with?
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_SHEPIMENYE_000_005<tab>Ah, so Pawkwena sent you to get produce. You'll certainly find no shortage of that here.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_SHEPIMENYE_000_006<tab>This time of year, we have glassgem corn, Turali pumpkins, and sweet popotoes. Take your pick.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_SHEPIMENYE_000_007<tab>You may freely choose between glassgem corn, Turali pumpkins, and sweet popotoes. Knowing Pawkwena, she can cook a delectable dish with any of them.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_SYSTEM_110_008<tab>Plump kernels of corn peek out from within the dried husks.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_Q1_100_008<tab>Select the glassgem corn?
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_SHEPIMENYE_000_008<tab>Corn is a highly versatile vegetable. I'll bag it up for you─here.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_SYSTEM_110_009<tab>The brightly colored pumpkins are heavy with pulp and seeds.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_Q2_100_009<tab>Select the Turali pumpkin?
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_SHEPIMENYE_000_009<tab>This year's pumpkin harvest has been especially flavorful. I'll bag it up for you─here.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_SYSTEM_110_010<tab>Judging from the sheer size, these tubers are sure to be filling.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_Q3_100_010<tab>Select the sweet popoto?
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_SHEPIMENYE_000_010<tab>Sweet popotoes are one of my all-time favorites. I'll bag it up for you─here.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_SHEPIMENYE_000_011<tab>When it comes to produce, freshness is key. You should take it to Pawkwena without delay.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_PAWKWENA_000_012<tab>Welcome back! Did you pick me out something tasty?
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_PAWKWENA_000_013<tab>Thank you! Yes, I think I'll bake up some hearty cornbread and serve it with butter.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_PAWKWENA_000_014<tab>Perfect! I should have all the ingredients for a light and sweet pumpkin soup.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_PAWKWENA_000_015<tab>Excellent! Looks like baked sweet popotoes are on the menu.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_PAWKWENA_000_016<tab>It's a traditional Yyasulani dish that's been passed down for generations. Even now it's fairly popular.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_PAWKWENA_000_017<tab>Made with our freshly grown vegetables, I feel closer to nature with every bite─something you won't experience with the food produced in Everkeep.
TEXT_KINGZF002_05150_PAWKWENA_000_018<tab>Anyway, thanks for humoring me. Here, take this─you don't mind ready-made, do you?
